languages.text: "Клеменциа, если тебе известно о том, что кто-то из твоей семьи причастен к тому, в чем вас обвиняют..."

traits.locale_text: "Клеменциа, если тебе известно о том, что кто-то из твоей семьи причастен к тому, в чем вас обвиняют, сообщи об этом. Если это так, то лучший способ сохранить честь — признаться".

languages.text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"
languages.original_text: "Клеменциа, если тебе известно о том, что кто-то из твоей семьи причастен к тому, в чем вас обвиняют..."

traits.locale_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the charges pressed against you..."
"Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the charges pressed against you..."
"Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the charges pressed against you—"
"Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the charges pressed against you—"
"Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"
"Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

languages.text: 「クレメンティアよ。もし、あなたの一族が嫌疑をかけられている罪を実際に犯した者を知っているなら…」
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: 「クレメンティアよ。あなたの一族が嫌疑をかけられている罪を実際に犯したと知っているなら…」

languages.text: “克莱门缇雅，如果你知道家族中确实有人犯下了厄本指控的罪行——”
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: “克莱门缇雅，如果你知道，家族中任何人确实犯下了厄本指控的罪行——”

languages.text: « Clémentia, si tu sais qu'un autre membre de la famille est coupable de ces crimes, tu... »
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: « Clémentia, si tu sais qu'un autre membre de la famille est coupable de ces crimes, tu... »

languages.text: «Clementia, si sabe que algún miembro de su familia es culpable de los cargos de los que se la acusa...».
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: «Clementia, si sabe que algún miembro de su familia es culpable de los cargos de los que se le acusa...».

languages.text: "Clementia, wenn Ihr wisst, dass ein Mitglied Eurer Familie schuldig dessen ist, was Euch vorge-"
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: "Clementia, wenn Ihr wisst, dass ein Mitglied Eurer Familie schuldig dessen ist, was Euch vorge-"

languages.text: "Clementia, hanenden birinin bu suçları işlediğini biliyorsan..."
languages.original_text: "Clementia, if you know that a member of your family is guilty of the crimes you are being accused of—"

traits.locale_text: "Clementia, hanenden birinin bu suçları işlediğini biliyorsan..."
